name: Inquisitor: The Hammer of Witches
description:
Use your skills and true faith to save the souls of innocent people. Lead investigations against heresies during which you will use many interrogation techniques such as whipping, breaking on the wheel, burning and many more! Listen to people, sometimes the rumors contain a grain of truth so can find the trail of real sinners. Every successful investigation improves your reputation among the people but be careful not to condemn innocent people to death because the people's favor is not permanent.

Main Features:
- Hundreds of different clues that can lead you to the mission's goal.
- Expand the headquarters of your inquisitor.
- Talk to citizens about their problems, listen to gossip.
- Lead the investigation yourself.
- You can be a clever detective who will solve the matter using the available clues... or a brutal torturer who uses torture to find out the truth.
